org.fosstrak.capturingapp
Class CaptureApp

java.lang.Object
  org.fosstrak.capturingapp.CaptureApp
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class CaptureApp
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

the capture application retrieves an ECReports from a specified socket. Then a set of registered handlers get invoked with the ECReports returning a simple EPCIS document. The capture application relays the EPCIS document to the EPCIS repository.

Author:
sawielan

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
starts the CaptureApp in event sink mode (means no relay to EPCIS).

Parameters:
args - the first command line parameter is the TCP port. if omitted port 9999 is used.
